The quality of fabric is very cheap, it was not worth to pay such heavy price. The material was transparent and thin.

It’s thin, see through, and it’s sewn together in a messy way. Threads were everywhere and not trimmed. The seams are crooked. The fabric is double layered and still you can see right through it. 评论概述: See through. Can see my underwear
评论详情: The title speaks for itself. Material is so thin you can see my underwear so I don’t wear it out. Return it within the month because I couldn’t return mine.
It is on the thinner side and a little see through. But it is very flowy and flattering. I love wearing it despite the fact there under skirt is starting to fall apart.
I love the fit. I plan to get other colors in this skirt.
This flowing maxi skirt was one of my favourite additions to my summer wardrobe. The colour and fabric went with so many tops and sandals. I lived in maxi skirts all summer. A++++

It's the right color, the right length, the right size, it's light and flowy, it even has a mostly effective liner. But that liner. *sigh* Ripped both seams of that bad boy within the first 30 minutes of wearing it. Do not allow the liner to be pulled taut before bending over or squatting, the liner fabric is too thin to hold up against the strong thread - I didn't pop the threads, the threads tore out of the fabric. Because I split the sides, I can easily add a triangular panel in the gap and hopefully avoid doing this again. If you're the type to gather all of your skirt to the front before squatting down to sit on your heels, be very careful.  I still recommend the skirt, I'm gonna buy a few more when I'm done writing this. But I wanted to give warning about the liner because the skirt is so thin that the liner is very necessary, it was glaringly obvious (in the rust colored skirt) that I no longer had any side coverage underneath.

I have a 44" waist and figured I'd have to add elastic to the large (which I do, but that's on me). The actual measurement of the elastic is 27" unstretched and 44" fully stretched. I can fit in it as-is, but barely, so I'll add what I need to make it comfortable. I got the rust red skirt and the color is a match, the fabric is nice and on par with what I expected based on the pictures, and it barely brushes the length is as described. Great skirt. Wish it came in bigger sized. Luckily, it's a full enough skirt that I have plenty of material to expand it.
I am not much of a skirt wearer, however, I really like this one's  light weight and flowiness! I wear it a lot!!!
I love the fabric and cut!! However it is too small and no Xl available.  I usually wear a large I’m an 8-10
I love this skirt so much! It was for a costume and it was perfect!

The "Light Green" color in the product photo looks like a beautiful sage green. The actual item is more of a mint green, closer to the "Fruit Green" in the colors offered. Not horrible, but not as expected. Unfortunately, the packaging was discarded or I would have returned it.
Expected the material to be of better quality! The material is so bad that it can rip off in single wash/use. The colour fades too! Definitely not worth the price. It’s just a one time use!

Nice stretchy waistband and soft, light-weight gauzy material that stays flat on tummy and doesn't puff out too much, but the red was pink...!  I'd prefer a full slip--having the slip on the top half, but not feeling it on the bottom half near my calves feels off...but maybe that's just me.
It is a lighter but very lightweight. I’m 5ft 2 So I rolled the waist down and it stayed and was comfortable. Like the lining and stretch of the waist band.

I actually found these on Temu first, but they did not have very many colors and yes, they are a lot cheaper on there but I loved these enough to look on Amazon to see if they carry them and they did and they had lots of different colors. I ended up buying, four from Amazon and they are so well-made. The thickness is great. My favorite thing is they have pockets. Any dress with pockets is right up my alley. They do not have strings hanging off of them. The sewing is fantastic. The quality the thickness and they are super comfortable. I have not wore them in public yet , so I don’t know if they are see-through or not but since it is white that is white underlay in it sometimes there is an issue with transparency. They are just so wonderful. I give a 10 out of 10 on these skirts. They go with Boho style to a T-shirt and I’m sure you could do more. You just have to try different things , but I bought them for a Boho style fabulous skirts. They just need to bring the price down because Temu will beat them 100% on price if they end up coming out with more colors and today’s society with companies already raking us across the coals we are all looking for , a way to save money and still enjoy life
Beautiful skirt- I will size up next time- the waist is a tad small

These are crazy cool! But I'm a 200 lb 5'5 woman.. these are really tight on me. Large is the highest they go.. time for that diet I've been talking about. 😂

评论概述: Color is off, but it fits!
评论详情: I am 5ft tall, 220lbs. Purchased size large and it fits comfortably with room to stretch around my waist.  Color: ordered the light green As with many of these reviews, you can see the color is different from what was ordered. The color is somewhere between the fruit green and light green. It still worked for my purposes but I was looking for something more faded.  I have several of these skirts from different amazon stores and different colors. The lining has ripped on all of them, as I am quite bodacious. If you too are booty blessed, you may want to consider making sure to wear shorts underneath. I am considering stitch ripping the lining and either adding a panel or just hemming the lining with a slit for more thigh room.
Absolutely beautiful! I feel like a hobet in my home and garden. It flows perfectly and it's so elegant!

I originally bought two of these skirts after a friend of mine showed up to a brunch event in it and I LOVED it. My 10 year old loves it too, so I bought one for her in the size small and was worried it might be too long, but it fits her perfectly! When it sits just higher than the top of her hip bones it comes just above the top of her feet. She's just under 5ft and wears a 10/12, so if you've got a girl wanting this skirt, it'll fit, AND I think she'll be able to keep this one for several years.

So, this arrived looking very bright and mint greeny. I want to use this for the Ren faire, and the mint color was not appropriate for my needs. I tea does it to get this more sagey green color. There are loose threads and the skirt does smell of natural fibers. I do however wish there were a tag in the skirt for care instructions or so I can know which direction it's supposed to sit. This is a beautiful lightweight gauze type material and gorgeous style. I purchased it for my granddaughter, for her trip to Europe next week. So I definitely would recommend it.

Got this to wear at a Renaissance Festival - loved the fit (very stretchy) and it was also nice amd full. It didn't look sad and wilty, it was full and flowy - no special underskirt needed for this skirt to work it's medieval magic.  Tied it up in knots to keep it from getting too muddy and it looked fabulous. It has a nice softly wrinkled texture so when you're rough of the fabric and tie it or sit on it, the wrinkles just look natural.  Slightly see through but only in bright backlit situations.
This fits very well and was the perfect skirt for my Renaissance Faire garb.
